code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./index.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TransactionStatistics=_ref=>{let{month}=_ref;const[statistics,setStatistics]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:3001/statistics?month=".concat(month));setStatistics(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);}};fetchData();},[month]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"statistics-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"heading-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Statistics - ".concat(month)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"data-container",children:statistics?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"statistics",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Total Sale"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:statistics.totalSaleAmount})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"statistics",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Total Sold item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" ",statistics.totalSoldItems]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"statistics",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Total not sold item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" ",statistics.totalNotSoldItems]})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})})]});};export default TransactionStatistics;
